backend/main.mo: Defines core domain types, maps, and lists for users, patients, staff, assessments, plans, activities, journal entries, tests, affirmations, and access control with mixin storage/authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented Flowers Chain game features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and styling of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining theme variables for light/dark modes and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the main router, routes for patient and staff pages, and initializes app layout and authentication.
frontend/src/components/assessments/Asse: Renders a sorted visual timeline of assessments with dates, vitals, and score details.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Simple access denied UI with icon, message, and navigation link back to the overview page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout and showing status with icons.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileAndR: Modal form for collecting user name, role, and optional patient details, then saving the profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Wrapper that blocks access unless authenticated and optionally staff, showing loading or denial screens.
frontend/src/components/community/Notice: Noticeboard UI for posting messages and displaying existing posts with timestamps.
frontend/src/components/game/flowers-cha: Audio player controls for looping calming music with play/pause, mute, and volume handling.
Renders the flowers grid and current chain info, allowing tile selection and chain completion.
Core game logic including board generation, adjacency rules, chain validation, scoring, and board refilling.
Clickable flower tile displaying an emoji and styling for selection state.
React hook managing game state, chains, board updates, scoring, moves, and game lifecycle.
Hook that cycles a random wellness snippet periodically or on demand.
List of wellness text snippets plus helpers to fetch random or specific ones.
frontend/src/components/growth/Achieveme: Renders a list of achievements based on journal count, completed tests, and streak data, showing unlocked status and conditions. Uses BreezeCard and SectionHeader for layout.
Displays the daily journal prompt and a recommended test, or a login prompt if the user is not authenticated. Pulls journal entries and test progress to personalize content.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with navigation, theme application, outlet rendering, and a footer. Wraps the app in a ToastProvider.
frontend/src/components/nav/BottomTabBar: Mobile-only bottom navigation bar that highlights the active route and links to main app sections. Uses icons and responsive styling.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileAppBar: Top mobile app bar that displays the current page title and a notifications button. Dynamically maps routes to titles with fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/nav/PrimaryNav.t: Desktop navigation bar showing patient or staff routes with active highlighting and mobile menu support. Includes login button and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/patterns/BreezeC: Reusable card component supporting gradients, images, icons, actions, and clickable behavior. Provides flexible styling and layout for wrapped content.
frontend/src/components/patterns/BreezeP: Styled primary button with size and variant options, optional icon, and interactive states. Used throughout the UI for main actions.
frontend/src/components/patterns/EmptySt: Displays an empty-state card with optional illustration or icon, description, and action button. Uses BreezeCard for consistent styling.
frontend/src/components/patterns/Feature: Reusable card component supporting icons, badges, gradients, background images, actions, and custom content.
frontend/src/components/patterns/Loading: Displays a centered spinner and optional message for loading screens.
frontend/src/components/patterns/Section: Renders a section header with optional icon, subtitle, and action element.
frontend/src/components/patterns/ToastPr: Provides a toast context for showing temporary notifications and renders toast messages on screen.
frontend/src/components/programme/Progra: Shows programme completion status with an icon, progress bar, and message.
frontend/src/components/scheduling/Appoi: Lists appointments with formatted date, time, location, and visual distinction for consultant vs therapy sessions.
frontend/src/components/scheduling/Consu: Form for booking consultant ward‑round slots, generating 15‑minute intervals and submitting appointments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useConsultationStatus: Derives a patient’s consultation status from profile and appointment data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the caller’s user profile and determines authentication and role flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many React Query hooks for fetching and mutating patient‑related data through an actor API, including profiles, onboarding, appointments, assessments, and plans.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemePreference.ts: Manages light/dark theme preference using localStorage and updates the document class accordingly.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables, transitions, and custom utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/patient/AssessmentsPa: Displays a patient's assessment timeline with loading and empty states, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/patient/CommunityPage: Shows community activities and noticeboard posts with loading and empty UI, gated behind authentication.
frontend/src/pages/patient/ExercisesPage: Displays chair‑based exercise plans for the authenticated patient with loading and fallback messaging.
frontend/src/pages/patient/FlowersChainG: Renders the Flowers Chain puzzle game UI, including board, score, controls, and instructions.
Displays patient follow‑up information, fetching programme plans and showing progress or login prompt depending on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/patient/FreeConsultat: Manages free consultation flow including form submission, profile saving, onboarding, and showing consultation status.
frontend/src/pages/patient/GrowthPage.ts: Shows user growth metrics such as journals, tests, and streaks, with loading and login states.
frontend/src/pages/patient/HomeCardDetai: Renders detailed content for selected home promo cards with navigation back to the homepage.
frontend/src/pages/patient/HomePage.tsx: Displays daily affirmation, today panel, and promotional opportunities with sharing and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/patient/JournalPage.t: Allows users to create, view, and delete journal entries with authentication checks and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/patient/MyProgrammePa: Displays the user's latest therapy programme, handles completion updates and help requests, and shows loading or empty states.
Public landing page showing the service overview, hero section, and feature cards, with login-dependent call-to-action.
frontend/src/pages/patient/ProfilePage.t: Allows authenticated users to view and update their profile, manage theme and logout, with loading and unauthenticated states.
Shows a user's upcoming appointments with loading and empty states, sorted by date and grouped by session type.
Runs a multi-question test flow, managing progress, answers, start/complete logic, and missing-test handling.
frontend/src/pages/patient/TestsPage.tsx: Displays available tests, user progress, and a quest card with navigation to the next incomplete test.
frontend/src/pages/staff/CaseloadPage.ts: Shows patient list and provides a form for staff to create programme plans with interventions and frequency.
frontend/src/pages/staff/DashboardPage.t: Provides staff metrics and forms to add community activities and noticeboard posts.
Allows staff to book appointments by selecting patient, staff member, time, location, and consultant status.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffAssessment: Enables staff to record patient assessments including vitals and multiple scoring fields.
frontend/src/pages/staff/TeamSetupPage.t: Renders a staff team setup dashboard showing teams, roles, capacities, and counts of staff and patients using fetched user data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL params and sessionStorage values, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, radii, keyframes, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, requirements, assets, and state for a Flowers Chain game website.
